alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 10:35PM MST until November 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Southwest Highlands, Western Magic Valley, and Southern Twin Falls County zones. * WHEN...From 5 AM Thanksgiving Day to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Use caution and give plenty of extra time if traveling on the I-84 corridor during the Thanksgiving holiday. Breezy winds could cause localized areas of low visibility, especially on US Highway 93 near the Nevada border.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley
